Consumable (Substance)

Spicebrew, a popular drink across the galaxy, is a tanned alcoholic beverage topped with foam. As an action, you can apply this substance to a creature within 5 feet. For the next 10 minutes, the creature experiences a high that increases their current and maximum force points by [[/r 2d8]]. At the end of the high, the creature must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or experience a low that lasts 4 hours, their current and maximum force points are reduced by [[/r 2d8]]. At the end of the low, the creature must make a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw to resist addiction.
